title: 376: Recovery for the Most Muscle Growth
description: Everyone knows that recovery is an important part of building muscle but what does recovery mean and how can you manipulate it to create the greatest adaptive response? In other words, what is the best way to recover to build maximum muscle? In this episode Sal, Adam & Justin address these questions so that you can reap the greatest benefits from your workouts. Have Sal, Adam & Justin personally train you with a new video on our new YouTube channel, Mind Pump TV. Be sure to Subscribe for updates. Get MAPS Anabolic, MAPS Performance, MAPS Aesthetic, the Butt Builder Blueprint AND the Sexy Athlete Mod (The RGB Super Bundle) packaged together at a substantial DISCOUNT at www.mindpumpmedia.com. Get your Kimera Koffee, Mind Pump's first official sponsor, at www.kimerakoffee.com, code "mindpump" for 10% off! Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Each week our favorite reviewers are announced on the show and sent Mind Pump T-shirts!
